Our custom-built sites offer better SEO potential than bloated, plugin-heavy WordPress alternatives.

Enhanced Security

Astro vs WordPress: The Future of Web

Discover why Astro is revolutionizing web development and leaving WordPress in the dust.

Astro: The Future is Now

  • Blazing fast load times, delighting users and search engines alike
  • Built-in SEO optimization, no plugins required
  • Minimal JavaScript, maximum performance and security
  • Flexible and customizable, perfect for unique designs
  • Modern tech stack, future-proofing your website

WordPress: The Legacy Platform

  • Slower load times due to database queries and bloated themes
  • Reliance on SEO plugins, often slowing down your site
  • Heavy dependence on plugins, increasing complexity and security risks
  • Limited design flexibility without extensive customization
  • Frequent updates and security patches required

Why Choose Zoho?

  • Reliable service

Why Self-Hosting Emails Is Not Recommended

Self-hosting emails comes with significant risks and challenges, including:

  • Lack of robust spam filtering
  • Outdated technology and security risks
  • High maintenance and management overhead
  • Potential deliverability issues
